parse: Personal / Relative Pronoun - Nominative Masculine Singular
Verb - Future Indicative Active - 3rd Person Singular
str2: Of foreign origin; properly, to be a courier, i.e. to press into public service.
One. (including the neuter Hen); a primary numeral; one.
A Roman mile, measuring 1478.5 meters or 5820.9 feet. Of Latin origin; a thousand paces, i.e. A 'mile'.

parse: Verb - Present Imperative Active - 2nd Person Singular
str2: To go away, depart, begone, die. From hupo and ago; to lead under, i.e. Withdraw or retire, literally or figuratively.
(a) gen: with, in company with, (b) acc: (1) behind, beyond, after, of place, (2) after, of time, with nouns, neut. of adjectives.

parse: Personal / Possessive Pronoun - Genitive Masculine 3rd Person Singular
str2: He, she, it, they, them, same. From the particle au; the reflexive pronoun self, used of the third person, and of the other persons.
